data.title: Lazio live score, schedule & player stats
data.meta_description: Lazio live score, fixtures, player ratings and statistics.
data.text:
Lazio live scores, players, season schedule and today’s results are available on Sofascore.

Lazio next match

Lazio will play the next match against Venezia on Aug 18, 2024, 6:45:00 PM UTC in Serie A.

When the match starts, you will be able to follow Lazio vs Venezia live score, standings, minute by minute updated live results and match statistics.

We may have video highlights with goals and news for some Lazio matches, but only if they play their match in one of the most popular football leagues.

Lazio previous match

Lazio previous match was against Cádiz in Club Friendly Games, the match ended with result 0 - 1 (Lazio won the match).

Lazio fixtures tab is showing the last 100 football matches with statistics and win/draw/lose icons.

There are also all Lazio scheduled matches that they are going to play in the future.

Lazio performance and form graph is a Sofascore unique algorithm that we are generating from the team's last 10 matches, statistics, detailed analysis and our own knowledge.

This graph may help predict future Lazio matches.

Current Lazio players

Forward: Valentín Castellanos, Pedro, Mattia Zaccagni, Gustav Isaksen, Loum Tchaouna, Matteo Cancellieri, Diego González Midfielder: Mattéo Guendouzi, Mohamed Fares, Matías Vecino, Nicolò Rovella, Toma Bašić, Gaetano Castrovilli, Fisayo Dele-Bashiru, Danilo Cataldi, Tijjani Noslin, Jean-Daniel Akpa Akpro, André Anderson Defender: Nuno Tavares, Alessio Romagnoli, Luca Pellegrini, Elseid Hysaj, Manuel Lazzari, Adam Marušić, Mario Gila Fuentes, Patric, Nicolò Casale, Fabio Ruggeri, Alessandro Milani Goalkeeper: Ivan Provedel, Christos Mandas, Alessio Furlanetto

The current Lazio roster, stats and player performance can be found on this page.

There are also statistics for each player in all competitions with all total played and started matches, minutes played, number of goals scored, number of cards and much more.

Lazio top scorers list is updated live during every match.

You can click on players from the roster above and see available personal information such as nationality, date of birth, height, preferred foot, position, player value, transfer history etc.
